 <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎צְבוּ‎</span> **noun feminine thing, anything** (originally ***purpose***) (Palmyrene <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎צבו‎</span> [[BDB#Ldzb|Lzb]]<sup>357</sup> [[BDB#Cook|SAC]]<sup>100</sup> [[BDB#Cooke|Cooke]]<sup>266</sup>, Syriac <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">, all ***thing***; compare Late Hebrew <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎חֵפֶץ‎</span> ***thing***, from <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎הָפֵץ‎</span> ***delight in, crave***); — [[Dan.6.18|Dan 6:18]].
